channel.title: LLMs on Shane Caldwell
channel.description: Recent content in LLMs on Shane Caldwell

item.title: GPT-5 is Good, Actually: The Agony and Ecstasy of Public Benchmarks
item.description: An attempt to explain why benchmarks are either bad or secret, and why the bar charts don't matter so much.

item.title: The Input Sanitization Perspective on Prompt Injection
item.description: An analysis of prompt injection vulnerabilities in large language models and why they represent a fundamental security challenge.
